name: Candy Collector
description:
Candy Collector is a Sweet Collecting platformer made for VimJam2020!

Controls:

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Mouse for Menus

Esc to Pause

How To Play:

Move and Jump through the levels, bounce on the jellies to just across gaps. Collect the Flying Saucers to dash in 1 of 8 directions. Collect the cake at the end of the level and make your way back to the start of the level.

Dash, Jump and Bounce through levels to grab the cake at the end and return the start of the Stage! But watch out, the level wont be the same when you try and get back. Platforms change, hazards move but theres more to collect so get collecting!

This game was created by 4 people, 2 Programmers and 2 Artist!

Rongjie Tan - Artist @RongjieT

Scott Brookes - Artist @ScottBrookes6

George Moore - Programmer

Ben Ankers - Programmer @BenAnkers4
